name: Lake Land Puzzle Pack
description:
Lake Land Puzzle Pack

Sliding puzzles make their way from photos of Lake Land's College Campus. From Nature to Architecture and shrubbery in-between, piece together the campus grounds in a calm experience next to grooving music.

Features
  • Sliding Puzzle Mechanic
  • 3x3 Puzzles of Campus Locations
  • 16 Megapixel Photos
  • 8 Puzzles to Solve
